description: Detects suspicious process patterns found in logs when CrackMapExec is used
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
name: HackTool - CrackMapExec Process Patterns
query: (((process.command_line.text:"*tasklist\ \/fi\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*Imagename\ eq\ lsass.exe*" AND process.command_line.text:("*cmd.exe\ \/c\ *" OR "*cmd.exe\ \/r\ *" OR "*cmd.exe\ \/k\ *" OR "*cmd\ \/c\ *" OR "*cmd\ \/r\ *" OR "*cmd\ \/k\ *") AND user.name:(*AUTHORI* OR *AUTORI*))) OR ((process.command_line.text:"*do\ rundll32.exe\ C\:\\windows\\System32\\comsvcs.dll,\ MiniDump*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\\Windows\\Temp\\*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ full*" AND process.command_line.text:"*%%B*")) OR ((process.command_line.text:"*tasklist\ \/v\ \/fo\ csv*" AND process.command_line.text:"*findstr\ \/i\ \"lsass\"*")))
